ExampleDefinition.Title: Stacked Bar Chart
ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Shows how to create stacked bar chart
ExampleDefinition.Description: <Run FontSize="14" FontWeight="Bold">Stacked Bar Chart</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Generates a Stacked Bar chart in code-behind. The StackedColumnRenderableSeries can be used to render columns stacked one above another, side by side, or a Left or Right aligned Bar Chart.</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13">Columns are rendered using the SeriesColor (outline) and FillBrush (fill).</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic">Tip!</Run> <LineBreak/><LineBreak/> <Run FontSize="13" FontStyle="Italic">Do you need to change the width of the column? Try setting DataPointWidth from 0.0 to 1.0. This alters how much space the column takes up.</Run>
